auto.description: Video quality on YouTube™ is set to automatic.

blockAds.description: Describes the Ad Blocking on YouTube™ feature.

cinemaMode.description: Part of the video player enhancement buttons - changes the view of the player to simulate a cinema screen.

extDescription.description: The description of the extension. HD is short for High Definition.
extDescription.message: Sorgen Sie dafür, dass YouTube-Videos automatisch in HD abgespielt werden.

extName.description: The name of the extension. Please translate it to whatever is most similar to 'Auto HD'. HD is short for High Definition.

extSettings.description: When you translate 'Auto HD', please ensure that it is translated the same as in the extension name (above). HD is short for High Definition.

fillMode.description: Part of the video player enhancement buttons - changes the view of the player to fill the entire screen.

globalSettingsMenuItem.description: Page name in the Settings area - Global Settings.

hd.description: Video quality on YouTube™ is set to HD

hideExtras.description: Part of the video player enhancement buttons - changes the view of the player show only player and hide all other items on the page.

information_adBlockingSubTitle.description: Tooltip that appears on hover on the Ad Blocking on YouTube™ feature - might be conflicting on some countries.
information_adBlockingSubTitle.message: Ist in manchen Ländern unter Umständen nicht mit youtube.com kompatibel

information_adBlockingSubTitleFull.description: Warning about the Ad Blocking on YouTube™ feature - might be conflicting on some countries.
information_adBlockingSubTitleFull.message:
Ist in manchen Ländern unter Umständen nicht mit YouTube kompatibel.
Kann jederzeit in den Einstellungen deaktiviert werden.

information_adBlockingTitle.description: Describes the Ad Blocking on YouTube™ feature.

information_downloadVideosSubTitle.description: Description about the feature to download videos in HD on Vimeo.
information_downloadVideosSubTitle.message: Hier können Sie Full-HD-Videos von Vimeo herunterladen.

information_enhancementsButtonsSubTitle.message: Über die Schaltflächen unter dem YouTube-Player können Sie den Videoanzeigemodus optimieren und wechseln.

large.description: String is used in two places: 1) Video player size on YouTube™ is set to large. 2) Video quality on YouTube™ is set to Large (480).

max.description: Video quality on YouTube™ is set to HD Max

medium.description: Video quality on YouTube™ is set to Medium (360).

onboardingFirstWalkthroughCTA1.description: First CTA of first walkthrough bubble

onboardingFirstWalkthroughCTA2.description: Second CTA of first walkthrough bubble

onboardingFirstWalkthroughP.message: Hiermit können Sie Ihr Bilderlebnis wesentlich verbessern.

onboardingSecondWalkthroughP.description: First part of Paragraph of second walkthrough bubble

onboardingSecondWalkthroughP2.description: second part of Paragraph of second walkthrough bubble
onboardingSecondWalkthroughP2.message: zum Festlegen Ihrer globalen Standardeinstellungen: Blockieren von Werbung, Videoqualität und vieles mehr.

rateUsMenuItem.description: Section name: A page that allows users to give rating to the product.

rateUsThanks.description: Confirmation message after rating for product was submitted.

reportBugMenuItem.description: A link to a form that allows users to report a bug.

setting_adBlockingSwitcher.description: Section name: Ad blocking on YouTube™

setting_darkThemeSwitcher.description: Section name: Dark theme on YouTube™.

setting_downloadVideosSwitcher.description: Section name: download video. Asterisk refers to more information located in the footer.

setting_enhancementsButtonsSwitcher.description: Section name: choose to see enhancement buttons below video player on YouTube™.

small.description: String is used in two places: 1) Video player size on YouTube™ is set to Small. 2) Video quality on YouTube™ is set to Small (240).

suggestFeatureMenuItem.description: A link to a form that allows users to suggest a feature.

tooltip_captureScreen.description: Button to take a screenshot of current played frame of video on YouTube™.

videoInsighsHeadline.description: Name of the feature - video insights

videoInsighsInformationOverlay.description: Information overlay for the feature - video insights. Do not translate anything insights the link tag - <a href...> - just the word 'Privacy Policy'
videoInsighsInformationOverlay.message: Bewegen Sie den Mauszeiger über ein Video, um zu sehen, wie viele Aufrufe, Kommentare sowie „Daumen hoch“- und „Daumen runter“-Angaben es erhalten hat. So können Sie feststellen, welche Videos gut und/oder schlecht sind, bevor Sie sie ansehen. Hierfür benötigen wir Zugriff auf die Websites, die Sie besucht haben. (Weitere Informationen finden Sie in unserer Datenschutzrichtlinie.)
